snippet.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. The World : The Game -- Wallace Wells & Online Multiplayer mode DLC [UK]
snippet.description:
More information on http://www.scottpilgrimvstheworldthegame.com 

Scott Pilgrim vs. the World: The Game is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game based on the Scott Pilgrim series of comic books by Bryan Lee O'Malley. 

Scott Pilgrim DLC: Wallace Wells Add-On Pack will provide this long awaited online multiplayer experience, packed with a new playable character.
New Co-op Online multiplayer mode:
 
• Invite up to 3 players in a private match or host a public match 
• Join Server through quick join option or from list of servers 
• Levels, characters, abilities, achievements similar to local multiplayer 
• All players to gain XP and level up while playing 
• Offered trial mode
